# 2013 President's Cup (tennis) – Men's singles__disambig_1

Dudi Sela
| runner =  Mikhail Kukushkin
| score  = 5–7, 6–2, 7–6(8–6)
}}
Evgeny Donskoy was the defending champion, but chose not to compete.
Number 1 seed Dudi Sela overcame Mikhail Kukushkin 5–7, 6–2, 7–6(8–6).
Seeds
Dudi Sela (champion)
#  Teymuraz Gabashvili  (quarterfinals)
#  Andrey Golubev (semifinals)
#  Konstantin Kravchuk (semifinals)
#   Marsel İlhan (quarterfinals)
#  Mikhail Kukushkin (final)
#  Ivan Sergeyev (quarterfinals)
#  Dzmitry Zhyrmont (quarterfinals)
}}
